headline.main: VICHY SENTENCES 26 REDS; 24 Acquitted at Marseille -- 13 Penalized on Appeal

abstract: Marseille ct sentences 26 Communists, acquits 24; 5 sentenced, Montpelier; Lyons increases sentences of 13

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
